website_summaries.verdict: High quality knives and stylish board are perfect for entertaining.
pros: 4-piece cutlery paired with a unique slate cheese board that can be personalized with chalk
cons: Some customers did not receive their soap stone chalk

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of its size. You can put a lot of cheese on it. The utensils are excellent. The board itself is a relatively thin slate tile with rubber feet that has a slightly rough surface and very rough edges. The edges are rough and sharp enough that you need to be careful handling it. The board was well packed in an inner box, but the utensils were loosely packed inside the outer box. I couldn’t find the soapstone chalk, but I already have one if I decide to use it. The sharpish edges and the missing chalk kept it from 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. F.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Slate Board That You Can Write On
customer_reviews.text: Neat idea and works perfectly. It was a big hit at our Christmas party. We put out a variety of cheeses and wrote the type of cheese under each one. Everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: mikeheel

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Practical, and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect plate for our cheese spread--holiday or otherwise. Attractive and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bortz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product at amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my sister who entertains alot. It arrived in perfect condition and is one beautiful piece of slate! The stainless steel accessories are just an added bonus! She will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ricco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for Our Christmas cheese & meat board!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The cheese plate is very nice. It fit six different cheeses very easily
customer_reviews.text: The cheese plate is very nice. It fit six different cheeses very easily. The chalk is safely attached to the foam packaging so it could be missed. Really like the product and my guests asked where I got it. If you are looking for cheese plate highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: packerfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, as expected and described. Gave as a gift and receiver loved it. Appreciated follow up during shipping
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board is great! It looks impressive, is a heavy, good quality, and is larger than any I’ve seen elsewhere. I recommend this to anyone in the market for a great cheese board.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Skellie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend as a gift. She loves it and is very pleased with its size. Looking forward to many gatherings with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Zimon

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: No issues, fast, reliable, great customer service. Product was even better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: theChrisRoss

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but Missing Pen
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect and the utensils were useful. However, it did not come with the pen, which was one of the reasons I chose this item.
customer_reviews.author: PackerBacker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Classy and Doubles as Message Board
customer_reviews.text: This board is absolute gorgeous. The feet at the bottom prevents it from marring your tabletop. There's plenty of room for cheese, fruit, etc. The chalk makes it easy to label the cheese. The dark color is the perfect backdrop for making the items you put on the board stand out. When I'm not using it as a cheese board, I have it securely propped up on the counter and use it as a message board. The knives are very nice and a good size. Makes a lovely gift. The only negative is that it is heavy. It doesn't seem fragile so I hope it doesn't crack as others have complained.
customer_reviews.author: wifi-er

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to use for turtles
customer_reviews.text: I used this as part of my turtlea basking dock. It holds heat well and dries quickly. She uses her dock all the time.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Recipient seemed very pleased with the quality and
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a housewarming gift. Recipient seemed very pleased with the quality and Design
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool cheese platter and it even came with a pencil to write on the slate.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Antle

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly and was very carefully packaged for safe shipment. It was exactly as described and we are using it very happily.
customer_reviews.author: HMason

customer_reviews.title: Large cheese platter
customer_reviews.text: The cheese board is very large and great quality and the knives are nice and sharp. Beware though it came with no chalk markers like the description says!
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and it’s just as nice as I expected. I love the stainless steel utensils, however, I am missing the soap stone chalk. I couldn’t find a “contact us before you leave a review” tab to request the chalk to be shipped out to me. Can someone get in touch with me to make sure that the chalk finds it’s way to my home, please? Once that happens, I’ll make sure to change my rating. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sassynattie71

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice! Packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Well made, heavy! Very very nice! Packaged well, all in all...... IT IS EXACTLY what I wanted! It is a Christmas gift! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie Peterson

product_meta.title: 20" x 14" Extra Large Slate Cheese Board and Stainless Steel Cutlery Set - Includes 4 Knives plus a Soap Stone Chalk, Perfect Cheese Platter Slate Board, Wine and Cheese Serving Board Brie Swiss
product_meta.description:
Premium Quality Cheeseboard! 
Throwing a proper party requires having the proper décor and serving tools. And with our beautiful slate set you can now make an artistic impression on all your friends and family! Take a look at our beautiful slate board with large surface area for ultimate serving experience! A chic beautiful set of cutlery also comes with your premium cutting board so sit back and relax as we include everything for all of your cheese platter needs. 
----------------- Features ----------------- 
✔ PREMIUM QUALITY SLATE CHEESEBOARD WITH CUTLERY SET – Beautifully crafted cheeseboard includes set of premium quality cutlery, makes a perfect item for a wedding, party, or to simply share time with your loved ones or best friends 
✔ CHEESEBOARD WILL NOT CRACK – We stand behind the quality of our cheeseboard and cutlery set and should you ever have an issue where the board arrives broken, or breaks due to no fault of you own, we will replace it 100% free of charge 
✔ STAINLESS STEEL CUTLERY SET WILL NOT RUST – Stainless steel cutlery set will not rust and will continue to amaze your friends and family with its rustic beauty 
✔ BEAUTIFUL FOR ANY DINNER PARTY – Receive complement after complement from your party guests surrounding this beautiful cheese board platter with cutlery set 
✔ PERFECT SIZE AND SHAPE FOR ANY HOME – 20" x 14" x 0.3 inch is the perfect size for any kitchen, party table, or gathering of loved ones, easy to clean and wash and reuse for many years to come 
------ Premium Quality Cheese Board Platter with Cutlery Set------ 
Our products are all backed by our 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE, so if you have any problems at all, simply reach out to our world class customer service and we will take care of you until you are completely happy with your order!
